memberdef.argsstring: (const MediaStream *media, int streamType, const AVPacket *packet, bool discardPacket)
memberdef.name: AVDecodePacket

detaileddescription.para:
Set a global configuration property.
flag
One of MediaConfigFlag values
value
New property value
0 on success; -1 on failure

Get a global configuration property.
flag
One of MediaConfigFlag values
Property value; negative on failure

Retrieve properties of the loaded media.
media
A valid MediaStream
Filled MediaProperties structure on success; empty structure on failure

Set the playback position of a MediaStream.
media
A valid MediaStream
timeSec
Desired position in seconds
true on success; false otherwise

Get the playback position of a MediaStream in seconds.
media
A valid MediaStream
Playback position in seconds; negative on failure

Enable or disable loop playback for a MediaStream.
media
A valid MediaStream
loopPlay
true to enable looping; false to disable
true on success; false otherwise

Load a MediaStream from a file.
fileName
Path to the movie file
MediaStream on success; empty structure on failure

Load a MediaStream from a file with flags.
fileName
Path to the movie file
flags
Combination of MediaLoadFlag values
MediaStream on success; empty structure on failure

Load a MediaStream from a custom stream with flags.
streamReader
A valid MediaStreamReader with callback functions and context
flags
Combination of MediaLoadFlag values
MediaStream on success; empty structure on failure

Check if a MediaStream is valid (loaded and initialized).
media
MediaStream structure
true if media is valid; false otherwise

Unload a MediaStream and free its associated memory.
media
Pointer to a valid MediaStream

Get the state of a MediaStream.

A valid MediaStream
Current state; MEDIA_STATE_INVALID on failure

Set the state of a MediaStream (play, pause, or stop).
media
A valid MediaStream
newState
Desired state
The new state on success; MEDIA_STATE_INVALID on failure

Update a MediaStream.

Pointer to a valid MediaStream
true on success; false otherwise

deltaTime
